description:
Finally, a page loader that actually works! This loader will display before your Bubble page elements are visible on the screen. No more awkward page loading ðŸ™ŒðŸŽ‰

Match your branding with fast loading custom Lottie file animations!

Auto hide the loader on a time delay or show/hide the loader on demand with Bubble actions!
name: 1T - Page Loader
plugin_instructions:
Add the Loader element to your Bubble page. It's that easy! 

If there is a loader element on the current Bubble page you can use the show and hide actions from any where in your app including reusables!
